title: 820-00281 random shut off
message:
Laptop is like new with only 17 cycles. Shuts off randomly, does not restart on its own. No report. 
completely clean and untouched.

Do these have any mosfet issue?

title: 820-00281 random shut off
message:
There should be some history available.

Try first with USB macOS; discard software issue.
Do also PRAM reset.
See if still turns off starting in safe mode, or SMC bypass.

You can try clean ME BIOS, just in case.
